Philippe Barbe

Books

q-Algebraic Equations, their power series solutions, and the asymptotic behavior of their coefficients , 2020 , with J. Cano, P. Fortuny Ayuso, W.P. McCormick

Asymptotic expansions for infinite weighted convolutions of heavy tail distributions and applications , Memoirs of the American Mathematical Society, AMS, 2009 , with W.P. McCormick (UGA)

Integral over Asymptotic Sets, with Applications in Statistics and Probability , 2003

Cours de Probabilité pour la Licence , Belin and Editions 31; 2nd edition EDP (2007), 1999 , with Michel Ledoux (UPS)

The Weighted Bootstrap , Lecture Notes in Statistics, Springer, 1995 , with Patrice Bertail (INRA)

Published papers

A conditional limit theorem for a bivariate representation of a univariate random variable and conditional extreme values (2016): Extremes, 19, 351--370, with M.I. Seifert.

Invariance principles for some FARIMA and nonstationary linear processes in the domain of a stable distribution (2012): Probability Theory and Related Fields, 154, 429--476, with W.P. McCormick.

The point process approach for fractionally differentiated random walks under heavy traffic (2012): Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 122, 4028--4053, with W.P. McCormick.

Heavy-traffic approximations for fractionally integrated random walks in the domain of attraction of a non-Gaussian stable distribution (2012): Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 122, 1276--1303, with W.P. McCormick.

A critical reanalysis of Maryland State Police searches (2012): The American Statistician, 66, 1--7, with W.C. Horrace.

Veraverbeke's theorem at large - on the maximum of some processes with negative drift and heavy tail innovations (2012): Extremes, 14, 63--125, with W.P. McCormick.

An extension of a logarithmic form of Cramér's ruin theorem to some FARIMA and related processes (2010): Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 120, 801--828, with W.P. McCormick.

Asymptotic expansions for weighted convolutions of rapidly varying subexponential distributions (2008): Theory of Probability and Related Fields, 141, 155--180, with W.P. McCormick.

Tail expansions for the distribution of the maximum of a random walk with negative drift and regularly varying increments (2007): Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 117, 1835--1847, with W.P. McCormick and C. Zhang.

Asymptotic expansions for distributions of compound sums of random variables with rapidly varying subexponential distribution (2007): Journal of Applied Probability, , 670--684, with W.P. McCormick and C. Zhang.

On the tail behavior of sums of dependent risks (2006): Astin Bulletin, 36, 361--373, with A.L. Fougères and Ch. Genest.

On sharp large deviations for sums of random vectors and multidimensional Laplace approximation (2005): Theory of Probability and its Applications, 49, 561--588, with M. Broniatowski.

Asymptotic expansions of convolutions of regularly varying distributions (2005): Journal of Australian Mathematical Society, 78, 339--371, with W.P. McCormick.

Tail calculus with remainder, applications to tail expansions for infinite order moving averages, randomly stopped sums, and related topics (2004): , 7, 337--365, with W.P. McCormick.

Second order expansion for the maximum of some stationnary Gaussian sequences (2004): Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 110, 315--342, with W.P. McCormick.

Blowing number of a distribution for a statistics and loyal estimators (2004): Statistics and Probability Letters, 69, 465--475, with M. Broniatowski.

Effect of preparation convergence on retention and seating discrepancy of complete veneer crowns (2004): Journal of Oral Rehabilitation, 31, 1007--1013, with D.C.N. Chan, A.H. Wilson, R.J. Cronin, C. Chung, K. Chung.

A central limit theorem for rejective sampling (2003): Sankhyà, A, 65, 1--22.

Simulation in exponential families (1999): ACM Transactions on Modeling and Computer Simulation (TOMACS), 9, 203--223, with M. Broniatowski.

Note on functional large deviation principle for fractional ARIMA processes (1998): Statistical Inference for Stochastic Processes, 1, 17--27, with M. Broniatowski.

Last passage time for the empirical mean of some mixing processes (1998): Statistics and Probability Letters, 40, 237--245, with M. Doisy and B. Garel.

Large deviation principle for sequential rank processes (1998): Mathematical Methods of Statistics, 7, 98--110, with M. Broniatowski.

Statistical Analysis of mixtures and the empirical probability measure (1998): Acta Applicandae Mathematicae, 50, 253--340.

Deviation principle for set indexed processes with independent increments (1997): Studia Scientiarum Mathematicarum Hungarica, 33, 393--418, with M. Broniatowski.

Bootstrapping the renewal spacing processes (1997): Journal of Statistical Planning and Inference, 60, 199--214.

Functional Erdös-Rényi laws for processes indexed by sets (1996): Journal of Mathematical Sciences, 83, 356--369, with M. Broniatowski.

On Kendall's process (1996): Journal of Multivariate Analysis, 58, 197--229, with Ch. Genest, K. Ghoudi, B. Rémillard.

Statistiques de rangs linéaires, normalité asymptotique et thérorème de projection de Hàjek (1996): in Inférence Non Paramétrique -- Les Statistiques de rangs, pp. 167--202, J.-J. Droesbeke and J. Fine Eds ed., Édition de l'Université de Bruxelles and Ellipse.

On the distribution function for the spacings (1994): Statistics, 25, 367--373.

A review on some large deviation results (1994): Publication de l'ISUP, XXXVIII, 3--24.

Joint approximation of processes based on spacings and order statistics (1994): Stochastic Processes and their Applications, 53, 339--349.

Weighted approximation of the renewal spacing processes (1993): Journal of Multivariate Analysis, 45, 171--182.

Limiting distribution of the maximal spacing when the density function admits a positive minimum (1992): Statistics and Probability Letters, 14, 53--60.

Sur la probabilité qu'un cylindre coupe un réseau de plans dans R^3 (1989): Publication de l'ISUP, XXIV, Fasc. 3, 3--8.

Un coût du chômage? (1989): Travail et Emploi, 40, 63--71.
